DOC.brief_summary: Assess efficacy new drug ( receptor agonist modulates glutamatergic activity ) treatment schizophrenia . The primary objective study determine mGlu2/3 agonist dose 28 day superior placebo treatment patient schizophrenia measure Positive Negative Symptom Scales ( PANSS ) total score .
DOC.criteria: meet DSMIV criterion schizophrenia confirm modified SCID meet full syndromal criterion Axis I disorder take depot antipsychotic within 4 week screen take moodstabilizing agent
